api_list.api_description: Retrieve a list of all assets on CoinCap.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of assets to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: Fetch the list of available currencies with details from KuCoin.

query: Can you provide a list of available cryptocurrencies and their details from both CoinCap and KuCoin?

api_list.api_description: Get detailed information for a specific asset by ID on CoinCap.

required_parameters.name: asset_id
required_parameters.description: Asset ID to retrieve details for.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve details about a specified currency from KuCoin, including supported chains and contract address.

query: Provide detailed information about Bitcoin from both CoinCap and KuCoin.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve a list of all markets from CoinCap.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of markets to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: Get the list of available currency pairs for trading from KuCoin.

query: I need an overview of all available trading markets from CoinCap and currency pairs from KuCoin.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve a list of all exchanges from CoinCap.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of exchanges to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: Get the current service status of the KuCoin API.

query: Can you list all exchanges available on CoinCap and check if KuCoin's API service is operational?
